@1@ Default constructor. [[cpp/language/value_initialization|Value-initializes]] the stored invocable object and all adapted {{lconcept|view}} objects.&lt;br&gt;
The default constructor is deleted if
* {{tt|F}} does not satisfy {{lconcept|default_initializable}}, or
* {{lc|std::is_default_constructible_v}} is {{c|false}} for at least one type in {{tt|Views...}}.

@2@ Move constructs the stored invocable object from {{tt|fun}} and every adapted {{lconcept|view}} object from the corresponding view in {{tt|views...}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | f | invocable object used for generation of elements of {{tt|zip_transform_view}}}}
{{par | views | view objects to adapt}}
{{par end}}
